## Mess with data

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(aes(x = hwy, y = cty), data = mpg)
p + geom_point()


my_gg <- function(the.df){
  the.df %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = .data$hwy,
               y = .data$cty)) +
    geom_point()
}


my_gg(mpg)

library(rlang)


mutate_y <- function(df) {
  mutate(df, y = .data$a + .data$x)
}

iris %>%
  dplyr::rename(a = Petal.Length,
         x = Petal.Width) %>%
  mutate_y()


df1 <- tibble(x = 1:3)
a <- 10
mutate_y(df1)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 2
#>       x     y
#>   <int> <dbl>
#> 1     1  11.0
#> 2     2  12.0
#> 3     3  13.0

```
